You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Create Alerts for Survey Responses

Use record alerts on the Contact record page to receive alerts for survey responses. Service agents can view alerts related to customer feedback about closed cases, service quality, and more.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter or Feedback Management - Growth licenses, and IndustriesServiceExcellenceAddOn and FSCAlertFramework


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create a record alert	Read and Create permissions for the objects and fields the record alert uses

To see record alerts, make sure your admin has added the Flexcard component to the Contact page layout.

To create a record alert:
From the App Launcher, find and select Record Alerts.
Click New.
For What Record, select the record relevant to the record alert.
For example, select the Contact record where you want the alert to appear.
For Parent Record, select the record, such as a Case record that sets the context for the alert.
Select a record alert category.
Activate the record alert.
Enter a subject, such as Low CSAT Score, and a detailed description.
These values are visible on the record alert component on What Record.
For Effective Start Date, select the date when the alert becomes active.
For Valid Until Date, select the date when the record alert becomes invalid.
For Snooze Until Date, select the date until when the user can snooze the alert.
Select a Severity, such as Info.
Severity is populated from the record alert category, if any.
Save your changes.
To view the record alerts on a Contact record:
Open a Contact record, and select the Alerts component.
To refresh the list of alerts, click .

When you snooze a record alert, the Snooze Until Date field is updated for your reference.

Generate a survey invitation link, configure the invitation settings to control your survey's security, and send the invitation to contacts. You can receive alerts for survey responses on the Contact record.
